amendment.description: To prohibit the use of appropriated funds to construct, fund, install, or operate certain ethanol blender pumps and ethanol storage facilities.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 741 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 741 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 738. (consideration: CR S6633-6634; text: CR S6634) To prohibit the use of appropriated funds to construct, fund, install, or operate certain ethanol blender pumps and ethanol storage facilities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 741 proposed by Senator McCain to Amendment SA 738.
